@description: Official english translation for the OMMP Example Module
@module_description: This module is intended to serve as an example for mudule creation. It displays a counter that can be changed by the users.
example.allow_direct_edit#desc: Do you allow the user to input a number directly instead of using the buttons?
example.allow_edit#desc: Do you allow the user to change the number using +/- buttons?
example.allow_negative#desc: Allow counter to go into negative numbers?
cannot_use_button: You don't have the rights to use the buttons
cannot_update_value: Unable to update the counter value
cannot_edit: You don't have the right to direct edit the value
